name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Backend Engineer with over 10 years of experience in building scalable and resilient backend systems, proficient in **Go**, **Cassandra**, **Kafka**, **Kubernetes**, **Docker**, and **Envoy Proxy**. Highly skilled in designing and developing high-performance APIs and microservices, leveraging cloud platforms such as **AWS** and **GCP**. Experienced in financial systems and cloud-native architecture, with a strong foundation in automation tools and AI/ML pipelines. Demonstrated success in delivering critical projects for renowned companies including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

Utilized **Golang** for developing high-performance backend applications, focusing on efficient architecture to handle large volumes of requests.
Implemented **Cassandra** for distributed data storage, improving data retrieval performance by **40%** compared to previous database solutions.
Designed and orchestrated containerized applications using **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, enhancing system scalability and deployment speed by **30%**.
Integrated **Kafka** for real-time data streaming, helping to process and respond to user actions within **100ms**.
Kept system performance and reliability in check by introducing **Envoy Proxy** for managing microservices traffic effectively.
Executed cloud deployment strategies on **AWS** and **GCP**, ensuring high availability and fault tolerance.
Collaborated with frontend teams using **React** to ensure seamless API integration and optimal user experiences.
Participated in system design discussions to enhance performance and security across the application architecture.

• Designed and implemented robust backend systems utilizing **Go** to enhance performance and reliability in document workflows and user onboarding processes.
• Developed event-driven microservices with **Kafka** and **Cassandra**, facilitating efficient processing of financial data and seamless transaction handling.
• Deployed microservices on **Kubernetes** with **Docker**, optimizing resource allocation and scalability while achieving a 99.9% uptime.
• Created efficient data pipelines leveraging **AWS** and **GCP** cloud services to automate the secure exchange of regulatory data, enhancing processing speed by 30%.
• Conducted comprehensive security audits, ensuring compliance with industry standards, and integrated advanced authentication methods using **OAuth2** and **Envoy Proxy** for secure access management.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to drive successful system integrations and achieve project milestones, leading to a 20% reduction in deployment times.

Utilized **Go** alongside **Cassandra** and **Kafka** to develop robust backend services for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking, enhancing trading operations.
Engineered high-performance real-time price feed processors with **Kubernetes** and **Docker** to deliver up-to-the-minute trading data for high-frequency transactions, processing over **10,000** messages per second.

Implemented comprehensive test suites with **PyTest**, tox, and mock servers, enhancing QA and CI processes and achieving a **30%** reduction in development cycle time.
Introduced job queuing and scheduling solutions using **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution and managing over **5,000** concurrent tasks.
